game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has broken down, fragments of different eras exist in harmony. Players take on the role of a Timekeeper, tasked with restoring balance to the timestream by resolving temporal conflicts.
game.beginning: The game begins in the modern world, where players are introduced to their character and learn about their abilities as a Timekeeper. They soon discover that strange occurrences and anomalies have started to plague the world, hinting at a greater problem.
game.ending: As players journey through different eras, they'll encounter various allies and adversaries who hold the key to restoring balance to the timestream. Ultimately, the player must face their greatest challenge yet: a showdown with the mastermind behind the temporal distortions, the Time Reaver.
